issue.title: How to run gazebo integrated unit test

content.raw:
I just checked it, we have the `libgazebo_test_fixture.a` present in the 7.8.1-1 version.

```
jrivero@nium $  dpkg -L libgazebo7-dev | grep fixture
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_test_fixture.a
jrivero@nium $ dpkg -l | grep libgazebo7-dev | grep ^ii
ii  libgazebo7-dev:amd64                                  7.8.1-1~xenial                                        amd64        Open Source Robotics Simulator - Development Files
```
content.html:
I just checked it, we have the libgazebo_test_fixture.a present in the 7.8.1-1 version.

/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_test_fixture.a
